results.title: Live, Laugh, Dragula
results.description:
Live I am the one, exterminating son.
Laughing through the trees, strangling the breeze.
Love I am the sky, watching angels cry
While they slowly turn, conquering the worm.


Chart size: 104 stitches wide x 126 stitches high
Finished size: 7.375 inches wide x 9 inches high 
Stitches: 14-count Aida, 2 strands of floss
Backstitch: 1 strand of floss

Instant download info: 
This is a PDF pattern ONLY; completed stitches and kits are currently available through custom orders. 

You will be emailed a link to the download at your Etsy email address. Also, PDFs are available in your Etsy account under "My Account" and then "Purchase" after payment has been confirmed. 

In order to open PDF files you will need Adobe Reader, which can be downloaded here for free: www.adobe.com/products/reader

results.title: Self care svg, Moroccan tile svg, Square ornament positive words svg vector sublimation file, Self love digital file svg, Tile clipart svg
results.description:
Self care svg, Moroccan tile svg, Square ornament positive words svg vector sublimation file, Self love digital file svg, Tile clipart svg

▪️You will receive an Email with: 3 FILES

📩 1 SVG file (Scalable Vector Graphics) is an XML-based vector image format for two-dimensional graphics. The advantage is that you can modify image size without losing quality and detail. This vector format describes images as shapes, paths, text, and filter effects. Scaling the vector image preserves the shapes. This can be rendered at any resolution.

📩 1 JPEG file

📩 1 PDF file (A4 Format)

▪️Please note: This listing is an INSTANT DOWNLOAD and no physical product is included as you purchase a digital template ready to be printed on any printer or print shops.

▪️ORDERING:
After payment is complete the download becomes automatically available. Etsy will send you also an E-Mail with a link to download.

▪️ COMMERCIAL USE LICENCE:
Commercial use is acceptable as long as the final product is a PHYSICAL PRODUCT.
NON-ACCEPTABLE USE:
You are not allowed to distribute the purchase file as a digital download. You can not resell or give our Svg file away for free.

▪️ No customisations are included with this purchase. The design is provided as per the preview with no background (transparent background) in the Svg file.

▪️ Please note that I do NOT provide Cricut and Silhouette software support. I am a designer and work on digital files. I do not make physical products.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Wooden Sign, Inspirational Saying, Love Sign, Birthday Gift, Personal Mantra, Hand Painted Wooden Sign
results.description:
Words to live by - this Live Laugh Love piece would look beautiful in any home!  It would also be a unique gift for that special person in your life. This sign is made from good quality pine wood, stained in your choice of dark or medium stain and hand-painted in white lettering. This sign measures 3.5x 16 inches.

Not exactly what you're looking for?  Click on the link to browse my shop:  https://www.etsy.com/shop/JunctionBoxDesigns or contact me and I will work with you to create exactly what you are looking for.  I have lots of colors, styles & fonts at my disposal.

Each sign in my shop is hand painted and sprayed with a satin topcoat for years of durability.  A saw-tooth hanger is attached to the back for easy hanging.

Because each sign is individually hand made, no two signs are alike and will vary slightly in appearance. Each board chosen will have natural imperfections such as knots, nicks, different grain patterns and tones.  I try my best to represent the true colors of the paint and lettering, but there may be some slight variation due to the differences in computer screens as well as lighting in your home.

For custom signs, please allow 1 week following customer approval for processing.  Shipping times vary depending on location.  All signs are made in and shipped from Minnesota.

results.title: Mug with sayings Unique coffee mug Customized mug Coffee mug gift Vintage mug Christmas mug Coffee mug Coffee lover gift Gift for girlfriend
results.description:
Mug with sayings Unique coffee mug Customized mug Coffee mug gift Vintage mug Christmas mug Coffee mug Coffee lover gift Gift for girlfriend

ABOUT LISTING

Make any hour happier with our awesome 17oz campfire mug. From picnics in the park to bridal and bachelorette party, enjoy your favorite coffee, tea, juices, beverages and other drinks that come in mind! 

• Our 17oz enamel coffee mug made from lifelong enamel Designed with a stainless steel rim and premium quality enamel steel, this stylish mug is both campfire and stove-top safe. Crafted with safety in mind, these mugs are BPA free and perfect for your favorite flavored coffee or warm comforting soup.
Do not contain nickel composition, applicable to people who are allergic to nickel. Smooth and wear-resisting surface, easy to clean. Anti-alkali and acid proof, which features a long service life.
• Personalized decals are made using premium permanent vinyl.

HAND WASH ONLY! This mug should not be washed in a dishwasher or microwave.
-Dishwasher cleaning may rough the surface of the Enamel product. 
-Hand washing can ensure smooth and bright surface for many years. If you must use a dishwasher, please use the high temperature and less detergent.

• Options for design are almost limitless! Please feel free to peruse my shop for pictures and ideas. I love décor and designing so if you know what you want or have an idea and do not see it please message me and make sure I can do it!

*Please read all the details before purchasing.*

SIZE / MATERIALS

• Height: 3-1/2"
• Volume: 17oz 
• Material: Metal, Cast Iron with Stainless Steel Rim
• NOT all fonts have the same dimensions. For example, if you need specific dimensions, let me know.

COLOR

• Available in 5 color finishes that reduces fading and chipping: black, white, blue, red, green.
• There are several decal colors to choose from our colors chart in the images above. Colors may vary slightly from the color on your device screen.

TO ORDER

1. Select the decal font color from the drop menu.
2. Select the Mug Color from the drop down menu. (If you need more than 1 mug color, select 1st color, quantity and add to cart. Then select 2nd color, quantity and add to cart.)
3. Indicate what you would desire using the “Notes” section: quantity / font color / mug color / style (if applicable) /
5. Select “Add to Cart”

• Please check your spelling before submitting the order! The information you enter will be exactly the same as you write it down. If it is all caps as in “ASHLEY” then this is how it will be cut.
• All font is done as seen on font slide. If you would like a name capitalized or lowercase you must put that you want so in the “Notes” section to seller at checkout, if you don't specify the font will look exactly like it does on the font slide. 

LEAD TIME

• The lead time usually takes 3-5 business days. Orders are shipped within 5 business days (Monday-Friday).
• If you need your Mugs before a certain date. Purchase a rush order listing below to bump your order to the top of my cutting list.
• Please note the rush order fee only upgrades your processing time from 3-5 business days to 1-2 business days. It does not upgrade your shipping method. 
• RUSH ORDER SERVICE: https://www.etsy.com/listing/629886432

SHIPPING

• Campfire mugs (without rush processing) are sent USPS First and Priority class WITH TRACKING and typically arrive within 3-5 days within the US !!!After being shipped!!! 
• International orders are sent first class and Priority international mail, take between 7-21 days for delivery depending on the country.
• If you need your wine tumbler shipped quickly please message me and I will let you know how fast I can have it for you and if there will be an additional cost. 

INCLUDED

Awesome 17oz campfire mug with your personalized decal. 
This personalized campfire mug is the perfect gift for mountain and camping lovers!

Please message me with any requests for custom designs.

Thank you for stopping by!

results.title: NorthwestFolkDesign Hand Hooked Rug Live Laugh Love Pattern by Marijo Taylor Rug Hooking Patterns Hand Hooked Rug Primitive Pattern 16" x23"
results.description:
*This listing is for the pattern only and not the finished work* 

If you love hand hooked rugs with a primitive or antique look, then you have found the right place. Northwest Folk Design patterns are by Me, Marijo Taylor. They are a unique form of folk art that will transport you to a simpler time. My shop has all you need to get started, whether you are a beginner rug hooking enthusiast, or a long time rug hooker. Please let me know if you have any questions regarding your purchase and I will assist you in any way I can. Now a little more about this primitive rug hooking pattern.

Live Laugh Love  is my original designs. Sometimes I like to use affirmations in my rugs. A good visual reminder to live in the moment!

The pattern measures 16" x 23".  It is printed on primitive linen, with edges zigzagged, and a border of 3 1/2" or more. Each pattern comes with a photo of the full rug and a close-up photo to help in color planning. 

All Northwest Folk Design patterns are created by me and protected under copyright law. Please respect the artist. 

This pattern will ship via first class mail, or you can choose to upgrade to Priority shipping within the US. Check shipping policies for international shipping.

results.title: Live Love Laugh Charm - Memory Locket Charms - Fits 30mm Floating Memory Lockets
results.description:
Tell your story by customizing our eye-catching glass memory lockets with our charms.  As your life story changes so can your locket by changing charms and switching plates.  This live, love, laugh charm fits 25 and 30mm floating memory lockets.  Tell your story by designing your unique Lyfe Locket; with beautiful floating charms.
      
Lyfe Lockets make great conversation pieces; by personalizing your locket with our charms you can share snippets of your life with family and friends.  Design your locket by adding a music note and guitar to show your passion for the art of music, a peace sign and flag will show your love for the freedom of our country, share your favorite hobby by adding an artist’s palette or camera.  With your creativity locket expressions are limitless!

Lyfe Lockets are unique keepsakes that are a pleasant surprise for any mom, sister, daughter, grandmother, granddaughter, aunt, niece, daughter-in-law, sister-in-law or friend.  They make great gifts for birthdays, graduations and holiday celebrations.  They can be given to moms-to-be, just-because, Sweet 16, or to show that important someone in your life just how special they are.  Tell your story today or give a locket that tells a story for a family member or friend.  The charms and plates can be changed along the way to keep your Lyfe Locket alive with an exciting story!

Chains, Lockets and Plates can be purchased separately.

NOTE – Lockets and charms are not suitable for small children; they are glass and contain small pieces.

What you will get:

1 - Live, Love, Laugh fits floating lockets - Your  Choice of Color

results.title: The Starry Night (1889) by Vincent Van Gogh (Longsleeve)
results.description: The Starry Night is an oil on canvas painting by Dutch Post-Impressionist painter Vincent van Gogh. Painted in June 1889, it depicts the view from the east-facing window of his asylum room at Saint-Rémy-de-Provence, just before sunrise, with the addition of an imaginary village. It has been in the permanent collection of the Museum of Modern Art in New York City since 1941, acquired through the Lillie P. Bliss Bequest. Widely regarded as Van Gogh's magnum opus, The Starry Night is one of the most recognized paintings in Western art.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Stamped Spoon Hooks Coat Rack Recycled Silverware Art Wall Hanging Garment Hanger Silver Plated Coffee Mug Apron Oven Mitts
results.description:
Three vintage silver plated teaspoons are bent and stamped LIVE, LAUGH, LOVE to give you a stylish coat rack as pictured. This wonderful rack can be used for a variety of items like coats, backpacks, towels, hats, oven mitts, etc.. Mounted securely on a solid wood board that is predrilled and includes (2) 2 1/4" drywall screws for wall mounting. *Shelves/racks have predrilled holes for your convienience. If you would like to drill your own holes please make the request at time of purchase by entering a message in the "Message to Seller" box. Silverware patterns vary. Measures approximately 10 inches long, 4 inches deep and 4 inches tall.

This rack can also be personalized with family names or labeled something like "buddy" "guest" and "friend".  
To Personalize: Leave a detailed list of names/words in the message to seller box during checkout. Upper case and lower case as well as star and heart stamps are available. Hooks will be mounted reading left to right.
~~~~~
